main event: Multiple UFO sightings recorded in Chattanooga, Tennessee on 5 November 1953 and 7 November 1957.
interesting points: The first sighting involved one round bright white object seen for four minutes, possibly caused by a descending and ascending aircraft., The second sighting involved a bright object, 2 inches in diameter, observed flying at high speed from southeast to northwest., The sightings recorded both ground-visual and ground-radar observations., Each event concluded with remarks indicating no detailed report was found in the file., One observation lasted for 15 minutes while the other lasted for four minutes.
sighted object: one bright object, possibly aircraft, and one yellow-orange light
